name: Oblivion Silvercross
description:
The whole universe is in danger! You are the last defense of the Earth, called the Vassal Oblivion Silvercross, the elite of the elite - ready to defend the Earth from any Space Invaders. One of your friends started a rebellion and wants to invade the whole universe - Grell, who pilots the devious Serpent Wing ship.

Together with your friends, the fate of humanity rests in your whole hands! 

Features:

Normal Mode - Allows you to pilot Nightwing. The game's arcade approach.

Life Attack - Allows you to pilot Nightwing, but the game limits your life and bomb each area.

Vassal Attack - Allows you to pilot Nightwing, Poseidon, Swallow, Avenger, Arcus, Beetle and Exploder. Each ship has their own speed and stats.

Defend the Earth in Four Areas:

Area 1 - Front Liner (Easy)

Area 2 - The Second Defense (Normal)

Area 3 - The Rebels' Advance (Hard)

Area 4 - The Fallen Friend (Very Hard)
